info.title: Simple Form Template builder
info.description: Builds an html form with a specific layout, if the user wants to. It has access to the FormFactory (it extends it) and can build every form control.

prop.name: requiredNotes
prop.description: Whether the form has required visual input fields.

parameter.name: $action
parameter.description: The form action string. For Modules and Applications leave this empty and engage form with formFactory.

parameter.name: $defaultButtons
parameter.description: Options whether the form will have the default control buttons (execute and reset buttons).

parameter.name: $async
parameter.description: Sets the form to post async.

method.name: insertRow
method.description: Builds and inserts a form row including a label and an input.

parameter.name: $title
parameter.description: The label's title. It can be a DOMElement or a string (which will be nested into a span).

parameter.name: $input
parameter.description: The input to be inserted to the form row.

parameter.name: $required
parameter.description: Defines whether the input given is required.

parameter.name: $notes
parameter.description: Notes for the user to insert valid input.

method.name: buildRow
method.description: Builds a form row including a label and an input.

parameter.name: $title
parameter.description: The label's title. It can be a DOMElement or a string (which will be nested into a span).

parameter.name: $input
parameter.description: The input to be inserted to the form row.

parameter.name: $required
parameter.description: Defines whether the input given is required.

parameter.name: $notes
parameter.description: Notes for the user to insert valid input.

parameter.name: $requiredNotes
parameter.description: If set to true and there are required input fields, a note will be inserted after the form body and before the controls saying what the red asterisk means.

method.name: getRow
method.description: Creates and returns a form row.

method.name: getSimpleLabel

parameter.name: $title
parameter.description: The label's title. It can be a string or a DOMElement.

parameter.name: $for
parameter.description: The id of the input that this label is pointing to.

method.returndescription: The simple label, as the template builds it.

method.name: appendControl
method.description: Append a form control (button) to the form's control button container.

parameter.name: $control
parameter.description: The form control (button) to append.

method.name: buildLabel
method.description: Builds and returns a simple form label.

parameter.name: $title
parameter.description: The label's title. It can be string or DOMElement (span).

parameter.name: $for
parameter.description: The input's id where this label is pointing to.

parameter.name: $required
parameter.description: Creates a required span indicator for the input.

method.name: buildControls
method.description: Builds and appends the form default controls (submit and reset buttons).

parameter.name: $defaultButtons
parameter.description: Options whether the form will have the default control buttons (execute and reset buttons).

method.name: getNotes
method.description: Builds and returns a note container with context.

parameter.name: $notes
parameter.description: The user's notes for this specific input.

method.returndescription: The notes DOMElement to be inserted in the form row.
